text: Growing Up Creepie is an American-Canadian animated television series. It was created by Anthony Gaud, Chris Woods, and Carin Greenberg, and produced by Mike Young Productions. The series aired from September 9, 2006 to June 21, 2008. title: Growing Up Creepie
